error.title: Unknow system error
error.descr: Due to a transient problem, the system could not perform the operation you requested. The system administrators have been notified.
error.decision: Please, go and try again later.

error.title: Too long folder name
error.descr: The name that you choose is too long. It must be between 2 and 20 symbols.
error.decision: Please, go and try again with a folder name consisting of fewer than 20 characters

error.title: Too short folder name
error.descr: The name that you choose is too short. It must be between 2 and 20 symbols.
error.decision: Please, go and try again with a folder name consisting more than 1 character.

error.title: Folder with this name already exists
error.descr: Folder with this name already exists in selected parent folder.
error.decision: Please, go and try again with a new folder name.

error.title: Can't move folder into children folder
Can't move folder into children folder
The parameter ''Messages per page'' must be in range [5, 1000].
error.decision: Please, go back and try again with a correct value.

error.title: Bad recipient(s) e-mail address specified
error.descr: You typed an invalid email address in one of the address fields (TO, CC or BCC). The format for email address is
error.decision: Please, go , check or correct the email address in one of the address fields and re-send..

error.title: Unknown error when uploading file
error.decision: Please, go and try again with other file.

error.title: The choosen file is too big
error.descr: The file that you try to attach is more then 10 MB. It must be at most 10 MB.
error.decision: Please, go and try again with other file.

error.title: Unknown error when uploading file from WebDAV
error.descr: You may have no read rights for this file.
error.decision: Please, go and try again with other file.

error.title: Bad tag(s)
error.descr: The tag is too short or contains bad characters.
error.decision: Please, go and try again with a new tag(s) without bad characters and length with more than 1 character.
